verdict.summary: Emeril Lagasse Air Fryer wins for its stainless steel build with no toxic coatings or Prop 65 warnings, ensuring safety.

bestsellerWarning: Many popular air fryers fail due to toxic coatings like PTFE/PFAS and Prop 65 warnings for lead or BPA exposure risks.

winner.name: Emeril Lagasse Air Fryer
winner.fullName: Emeril Lagasse Extra Large French Door Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo
winner.whyItWins: Stainless steel, no toxic coatings, no Prop 65 warnings, safe choice.

materialEvidence.title: Stainless Steel Build
materialEvidence.description: No nonstick coating, reducing toxic chemical risk.

keyEvidence.evidence: Made of stainless steel with no nonstick coating [Source: Amazon]

customerValidation.context: Highly satisfied with performance and safety.

runnerUps.name: Arecovas Glass Air Fryer
runnerUps.whyItWorks: Fully visible glass construction allows you to monitor cooking without opening. No coatings means no toxic chemicals leaching into food.

runnerUps.name: GreenPan Clearview
runnerUps.fullName: GreenPan Clearview Extra Large 7QT Air Fryer
runnerUps.whyItWorks: GreenPan's ceramic coating is PFAS-free and proven safe. Extra large capacity perfect for families cooking multiple portions.

failureCards.name: Ninja Air Fryer 4 QT
failureCards.description: Fails due to Prop 65 warning for Acrylamide, a chemical linked to health risks.

failureCards.name: COSORI Smart Air Fryer
failureCards.description: Fails due to Prop 65 warning for Lead and BPA, posing potential health hazards.

failureCards.name: Instant Pot Vortex Plus
failureCards.description: Fails due to PTFE/PFAS content and Prop 65 warning for cancer risks.

failures.name: Ninja Air Fryer 4 QT (AF101)
failures.whyItFails: Prop 65 warning for Acrylamide, linked to health risks.

evidence.quote: WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Acrylamide

failures.name: COSORI Smart 12-in-1 Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo
failures.whyItFails: Prop 65 warning for Lead and BPA, posing health risks.

evidence.quote: WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Bisphenol A (BPA)... and Lead

failures.name: Instant Pot Vortex Plus 6QT ClearCook Air Fryer
failures.whyItFails: Contains PTFE/PFAS with Prop 65 warning for cancer risks.

evidence.quote: This product contains PTFE... and/or PFAS + Prop 65 Warning for Cancer

steps.title: Product Collection
steps.text: Analyzed 50+ air fryer listings on Amazon, focusing on sales rank, reviews, and material claims for safety.

steps.title: Material Safety Check
steps.text: Evaluated materials for toxic coatings like PTFE, PFAS, BPA, and checked for Prop 65 warnings on product pages.

steps.title: Certification Review
steps.text: Verified certifications like ETL, FCC, or explicit non-toxic claims to ensure compliance with safety standards.

steps.title: Customer Feedback
steps.text: Reviewed customer feedback for real-world insights on safety, durability, and performance of air fryers.
